resources.string: Explora lo mejor de Bilbao con nuestra app diseñada para turistas y amantes de la cultura. Navega fácilmente entre los puntos de interés y elige qué lugar quieres conocer.
The Bilbao Exhibition Centre (BEC) is a modern conference and exhibition center located in Barakaldo, Spain, hosting a variety of events and conventions.
The Guggenheim Museum is an art museum located in Bilbao, Spain. It is the second largest art museum in the world and the largest in Spain.
San Mames is a legendary stadium in football history, known as "The Cathedral," with a capacity of 53,000. Opened in 2013, it blends modern design with a rich heritage.
